description: Cognitive Car Dashboard sample workspace which allows multi-turn conversations to perform tasks in the car.

values: Of course. Do you have a specific cuisine in mind?
I've found the closest restroom stops. Which one would you like to drive to?

output.text: Sorry I don't have a listing for that and cannot drive you there.

values: There are gas stations nearby. Which one would you like to drive to?
Sure thing! Which genre would you prefer? Jazz is my personal favorite.
I'm not sure about that. You can say things like "Turn on my lights" or "Play some music."
I am having trouble understanding you. Try asking your question in a different way.
My system tells me that it is  <? now().reformatDateTime('h:mm a') ?>, on <? now().reformatDateTime('EEE, d MMM yyyy') ?>.
That would be  <? @sys-time.reformatDateTime('h:mm a') ?>, on <? @sys-date.reformatDateTime('EEE, d MMM yyyy') ?>.
I'm trained to turn things on or off in the car dashboard, play music and find nearby amenities like restaurants, gas stations and restrooms.
My system tells me the time is <? now().reformatDateTime('h:mm a') ?>.
My system tells me that the date is <? now().reformatDateTime('EEE, d MMM yyyy') ?>.
That would be <? @sys-time.reformatDateTime('h:mm a') ?>.
That would be <? @sys-date.reformatDateTime('EEE, d MMM yyyy') ?>.
Sorry I didn't catch that.
Sorry I haven't learned answers to questions like this.
That question is out of scope for this application, take a look at the Conversation Enhanced application to handle questions like these.
Sure! Restaurant @sys-number on the list gets great reviews.

output.text: Sure thing! The @option restaurant gets great reviews.

values: What day/time did you want to go to the restaurant?

output.text: Sorry I don't recognize that genre. Want to try something? Jazz? Rock?

values: Sure! Navigating to gas station @sys-number on the list.

output.text: Sure! Navigating to the @option gas station.
I understand you want me to find a location. I can find restaurants, gas stations and restrooms nearby.
